short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add items from the Internet to a shopping list or bookmark recipes from popular websites in Grosh, the intelligent shopping app

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Grosh extension for Google Chrome allows you to easily import recipes from many popular recipe websites directly into Grosh. You may also add items directly to a shopping or wish list using the Plugin. To use the plugin you must be have a Grosh account - you may create one using the regular Grosh app.
